\normalsectionstart{Overview}
Environmental Engineering student engaged in soil science research at the
Federal University of Lavras -- Brazil, focused on machine learning applied to
digital mapping. Working mainly with geoprocessing and proximal sensor
research. Developed several scientific articles about novel methods to use
proximal sensor data to assess and map soil attributes.
\normalsectionend

<!-- must insert section name and number of columns! -->
\multicolsectionstart{Skills}{2}
 + Knowledge and experience in data analysis using R and Python.

 + Basic knowledge in C++, Java, LaTeX and Bash.

 + Proficiency in supervised classification and statistical modeling applied to
   digital soil mapping.

 + Expertise in digital mapping, focused on soil science, but applicable to
   diverse scientific fields.
